metadata.synopsis: Banter between Shadowheart and Halsin in the mausoleum of Ketheric Thorm

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: So this is where you interred Ketheric Thorm, Halsin? Couldn't you have done a little more to prevent his return...?

2.speaker: Halsin
2.text: We did the best we could, under dire circumstances. You would suggest otherwise?

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: All I'm saying is that it's more difficult to come back from the dead if you were chopped up and had the pieces delivered to different corners of the realm.
